table_name: Median Household Income in the Past 12 Months

columns.name: median_household_income_moe
columns.description: Margin of error for median household income

sql_ddl:
CREATE TABLE b19013 (
  geography_id VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  year INTEGER NOT NULL,
  median_household_income FLOAT,
  median_household_income_moe FLOAT,
  PRIMARY KEY (geography_id, year)
);

median_household_income_moe.description: Margin of error for median household income
